value:
A long time ago, there was an ice
dragon in Ilia who helped the people
live through constant snow.$k$pMy sister told me that story
to help me sleep as a child.

Lady Lyndis has been recognized as
a noble lady of Caelin, so I can join
the service of her noble house.

All the Caelin knights are men, so
it was a struggle to adapt to that...
I'm still adapting, to be honest!

I found a lovely little spring not too
far from the castle. I wonder if Huey
would enjoy it...
Nyaah! Was thatâ€” Was that a bee?!

H-hello, I'm Florina. It's a pleasure.
I'm always happy to meet a friend
of $Nf's.

Yaaah! Behold the might of the
Pegasus Knights of Ilia! ...Wh-what
do you think?
I-I'm a full-fledged pegasus knight!

I won't cry over this... I'm a proud
pegasus knight of Ilia!
Th-thank you so much!

I'm Florina, and I'm a pegasus knight.
Lyn is a dear friend of mine, and I will
always do my absolute best for her.

Lyn's spirit is like the wind across
the plains... Swift and bracing.$k$pShe asked me to stay by her side,
to lend her my aid as her friend...$k$pShe's the type of person who makes
me want to always do my best, so I'm
happy to give her any help I can.$k$p...$k$p...$k$p...Oh! The same goes for you too,
of course, $Nu!$k$pI hope we can keep growing closer
as we continue to work together.
H-haa!
Fall down...!
Hyaah!
Stop it...
Take this!
I'll face my fear!
Please just surrender!
I won't lose!
But I came so far...
Hehe...
I'm trying out the bow now. Just like Lyn.
Oh! Uh. Heh... Do you need something?
I... Um... I want to keep getting stronger. To do my part.
You like my new outfit? That's so... Aww... Thank you...
Thanks to you, I feel like I can stand just a little taller.
I don't want to rely on my sisters and Lyn forever. I want them to see what I can do!
I just want to say, um... I'm happy to be with you... Aaah, no, pretend you didn't hear that!
Um, sure!
Over there, right?
I CAN do this.
